violation.name: com/google/common/collect/Maps.newConcurrentMap:()Ljava/util/concurrent/ConcurrentMap;
violation.comment: Prefer java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<>() or customize the map using com.google.common.collect.MapMaker

violation.name: com/google/common/primitives/Ints.checkedCast:(J)I
violation.comment: Prefer java.lang.Math.toIntExact(long); note that it throws an ArithmeticException instead of an IllegalArgumentException

violation.name: com/google/common/base/Preconditions.checkNotNull:(Ljava/lang/Object;Ljava/lang/Object;)Ljava/lang/Object;
violation.comment: Prefer java.util.Objects.requireNonNull(Object, String) or java.util.Objects.requireNonNull(Object, Supplier<String>)

violation.name: com/google/common/collect/Iterables.cycle:([Ljava/lang/Object;)Ljava/lang/Iterable;
violation.comment: Prefer Stream equivalent of this method is Stream.generate(() -> e) or Stream.generate(() -> collection).flatMap(Collection::stream)

violation.name: com/google/common/collect/Iterables.transform:(Ljava/lang/Iterable;Lcom/google/common/base/Function;)Ljava/lang/Iterable;
violation.comment: Prefer Stream.map(java.util.function.Function<? super T, ? extends R>)

violation.name: org/apache/commons/lang3/StringUtils.join:(Ljava/lang/Iterable;C)Ljava/lang/String;
violation.comment: Prefer java.lang.String.join or use java.util.stream.Stream with java.util.stream.Collectors.joining

violation.name: org/apache/commons/lang3/StringUtils.join:(Ljava/lang/Iterable;Ljava/lang/String;)Ljava/lang/String;
violation.comment: Prefer java.lang.String.join or use java.util.stream.Stream with java.util.stream.Collectors.joining
